Onderwerp: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Automatic conversion to short forms!

>Ewout,
>
>When I try opening the drivers, I get a
message that asks "what program do
>you want to open it
with?"  I have no idea.  What program do I want to open
>it
with.  I guess I'm unclear what to do after double-clicking on the zip
>file.
 
Dump all files in the Keyman Directory, after installing keyman. Then you can open them through keyman.

>BTW, I think it would be great if you wrote your name in in Junior
or Jerome
>for us so we'd know how to pronounce it.
 
 
I've been doing that for a while now, here it is again:
 
/EvQt stym
